noun.description: A road junction at which traffic moves in one direction around a central island to reach one of the roads converging on it; a traffic circle.
A large revolving device in a playground, for children to ride on; a merry-go-round.
A close-fitting, waist-length jacket worn by men and boys.

adjective.description: Not following a short direct route; circuitous.
examples: we need to take a roundabout route to throw off any pursuit
